# ServiceNullable&lt;T&gt;.Value property

The value of this instance, or null/default if the instance is unspecified.

## Remarks

This property does not throw an exception when unspecified or null. Check [`IsUnspecified`](./IsUnspecified.md) to distinguish unspecified from null.
